commit.message:
re PR rtl-optimization/90756 (g++ ICE in convert_move, at expr.c:218 on i686 and s390x)

	PR rtl-optimization/90756
	* explow.c (promote_ssa_mode): Always use TYPE_MODE, don't bypass it
	for VECTOR_TYPE_P.

	* gcc.dg/pr90756.c: New test.

From-SVN: r273036

files.patch:

+	* explow.c (promote_ssa_mode): Always use TYPE_MODE, don't bypass it
+	for VECTOR_TYPE_P.
